T

Talk - Class in main.java
Driver class for the Talk socket application.
Talk() - Constructor for class main.java.Talk
 
TalkClient - Class in main.java
A client implementation of the talk interface that prints messages from STDIN to the talk server and prints messages from the talk server on STDOUT.
TalkClient(String, int) - Constructor for class main.java.TalkClient
Constructs a socket that connects to the specified host on the specified port.
TalkServer - Class in main.java
A server implementation of the talk interface that prints messages from the talk client on STDOUT and prints messages from STDIN to the talk client.
TalkServer(int) - Constructor for class main.java.TalkServer
Constructs a socket listening on the specified port.
TalkServer(ServerSocket) - Constructor for class main.java.TalkServer
Constructs a talk server from the specified socket server.
